metadata.title: CVE-2019-7149 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
A heap-based buffer over-read was discovered in the function read_srclinesin dwarf_getsrclines.c in libdw in elfutils 0.175. A crafted input cancause segmentation faults, leading to denial-of-service, as demonstrated byeu-nm.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7149` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

elfutils - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3+esm1
libasm1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3+esm1
libdw1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3+esm1
libelf1 - 0.158-0ubuntu5.3+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: elfutils package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.158-0ubuntu5.3+esm1').
